summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Thirty-sixth Avenue from East James Street to East Spring Street et al, in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks under Ordinance No. 15533, creating Local Improvement District No. 1437 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
